Search the B.C. Data Catalogue

Source: R/bcdc_search.R
bcdc_search.Rd

Search the B.C. Data Catalogue

bcdc_search(
  ...,
  license_id = NULL,
  download_audience = "Public",
  type = NULL,
  res_format = NULL,
  sector = NULL,
  organization = NULL,
  n = 100
)

Arguments

...

search terms
license_id

the type of license (see bcdc_search_facets("license_id")).
download_audience

download audience (see bcdc_search_facets("download_audience")). Default "Public"
type

type of resource (see bcdc_search_facets("type"))
res_format

format of resource (see bcdc_search_facets("res_format"))
sector

sector of government from which the data comes (see bcdc_search_facets("sector"))
organization

government organization that manages the data (see bcdc_search_facets("organization"))
n

number of results to return. Default 100

Value

A list containing the records that match the search

Examples

# \donttest{
bcdc_search("forest")

#> Found 305 matches. Returning the first 100.
#> To see them all, rerun the search and set the 'n' argument to 305.
#> List of B.C. Data Catalogue Records
#> Number of records: 100
#>  (Showing the top 10)
#> Titles:
#> 1: RESULTS - Forest Cover Inventory (other, wms)
#>  ID: 56ac43a7-724a-4f01-b193-d5f9a16ef0a8
#>  Name: results-forest-cover-inventory
#> 2: RESULTS - Forest Cover Silviculture (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: 258bb088-4113-47b1-b568-ce20bd64e3e3
#>  Name: results-forest-cover-silviculture
#> 3: FDU - Forest Licence Reference (other)
#>  ID: 7e986391-c740-4d1b-9294-7576af2d2998
#>  Name: fdu-forest-licence-reference
#> 4: RESULTS - Forest Cover Species (Attribute Only) (other)
#>  ID: 2db77f8b-765b-488f-9752-f1349cf6ebfc
#>  Name: results-forest-cover-species-attribute-only
#> 5: Forest Tenure Managed Licence (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: c3e96239-cdc9-4328-ac19-58fba1623ef8
#>  Name: forest-tenure-managed-licence
#> 6: Forest Inventory Zones (other, wms, kml)
#>  ID: 67e95c68-c1ef-4363-b351-0dfead151122
#>  Name: forest-inventory-zones
#> 7: Harvested Areas of BC (Consolidated Cutblocks) (other, fgdb, wms,
#>  kml, pdf)
#>  ID: b1b647a6-f271-42e0-9cd0-89ec24bce9f7
#>  Name: harvested-areas-of-bc-consolidated-cutblocks-
#> 8: Mixed Forest 1:250,000 GeoBase Land Cover (other)
#>  ID: 902f5af2-9fce-4579-b48d-8bd7f85d36dd
#>  Name: mixed-forest-1-250-000-geobase-land-cover
#> 9: Coniferous Forest 1:250,000 GeoBase Land Cover (other)
#>  ID: 177b5ef0-8339-4fd7-a40a-93edb3797d07
#>  Name: coniferous-forest-1-250-000-geobase-land-cover
#> 10: Broadleaf Forest 1:250,000 GeoBase Land Cover (other)
#>  ID: 78bb0ee9-96ed-49fb-9c0c-7434b2f24d7e
#>  Name: broadleaf-forest-1-250-000-geobase-land-cover
#> 
#> Access a single record by calling `bcdc_get_record(ID)` with the ID
#>  from the desired record.
bcdc_search("regional district", type = "Geographic", res_format = "fgdb")
